S01klpdrapu:kda_230_0: kathaṃ te brāhmaṇā naiva yadi vedād dvijo bhavet* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_230_1: tasmāc ca vedamātreṇa naiva syur brāhmaṇāḥ khalu //
S01klpdrapu:kda_231_1: karmaṇā vai dvijāś caivaṃ sarve syur brāhmaṇāḥ khalu //
S01klpdrapu:kda_232_1: kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrāś ca kathaṃ na brāhmaṇā nu te //
S01klpdrapu:kda_233_0: tasmān na karmamātreṇa brāhmaṇāḥ syur narāḥ khalu /
S01klpdrapu:kda_233_1: nāpi svācāramātreṇa brāhmaṇāḥ syus tathā narāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_234_0: yadi svācārato vipraḥ sarve syur brāhmaṇāḥ khalu /
S01klpdrapu:kda_234_1: ye ye svācāravantaś ca te te syur brāhmaṇāḥ kila //
S01klpdrapu:kda_236_0: te 'pi syur brāhmaṇāś caivaṃ yady ācārapramāṇatā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_237_0: vedenāpi tathā naiva brāhmaṇāḥ syur narottamāḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_237_1: yadi vedair bhaved vipro rākṣaso 'pi dvijaḥ khalu //
S01klpdrapu:kda_240_1: cāturvarṇyam idaṃ lokaṃ tīrthikair iti kalpitam* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_241_0: tathā ca kalpyate loka- bodhārtham iti tīrthikaiḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_242_0: mukhato brāhmaṇo jāto bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyaḥ smṛtaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_242_1: ūrubhyāṃ saṃbhavo vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdraḥ samudbhavaḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_243_0: tathā ced dhi bhaved doṣo dharmeṣu varṇavādinām* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_244_0: yadi vipro mukhāj jāto brāhmaṇī kutra saṃbhavā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_244_1: brāhmaṇy api mukhāj jātā svasā bhāryā kathaṃ nanu //
S01klpdrapu:kda_245_0: tathā ca kṣatriyā jātā bāhubhyām eva cet tathā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_245_1: kṣatriyasya bhaved bhāryā kṣatriyā bhaginī khalu //
S01klpdrapu:kda_246_0: vaiśyāpi hi tathā caivam ūrubhyām eva saṃbhavā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_246_1: vaiśyasyāpi bhaved bhāryā vaiśyā tu bhaginī viśaḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_247_0: padbhyāṃ jāto yathā śūdraḥ śūdrī cāpi tathodbhavā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_247_1: śūdrasyāpi bhaved bhāryā śūdrī hi bhaginī khalu //
S01klpdrapu:kda_248_0: na yuktā bhaginī bhāryā tathā dharmaḥ kathaṃ bhavet* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_251_0: ke te ye brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_251_1: etad icchāmi bho jñātuṃ tadbhavān vyākarotu me //
S01klpdrapu:kda_252_1: pratyuvāceti kaunteya śṛṇu tat kathyate mayā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_254_0: yadā sarvaparadravyaṃ pathi vā yadi vā gṛhe /
S01klpdrapu:kda_255_1: muktaś carati yo nityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ brāhmalakṣaṇam* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_256_1: maithunaṃ hi sadā tyaktaṃ caturthaṃ brāhmalakṣaṇam* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_257_0: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā śaucaṃ śaucam indriyanigrahaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_257_1: sarvabhūtadayā śaucaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ ca pañcamam* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_258_1: tam ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāṃ śeṣāḥ śudrā yudhiṣṭhira //
S01klpdrapu:kda_259_0: na kulena na jātyā ca kriyābhir brāhmaṇo na ca /
S01klpdrapu:kda_259_1: cāṇḍālo 'pi hi vṛttastho brāhmaṇaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira //
S01klpdrapu:kda_261_0: ekavarṇam idaṃ viśvaṃ pūrvam āsīd yudhiṣṭhira /
S01klpdrapu:kda_262_0: sarve vai yonijā martyāḥ sarve mūtrapurīṣiṇaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_265_0: na jātir dṛśyate rājan guṇāḥ kalyāṇakārakāḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_266_0: jīvitaṃ yasya lokārthe dharmārthe yasya jīvitam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_266_1: ahorātraṃ caren muktas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_267_1: kāmeṣv asaktāḥ kaunteya brāhmaṇās te yudhiṣṭhira //
S01klpdrapu:kda_269_0: kṣamā dayā damo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ smṛtir ghṛṇā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_272_1: yuktaś carati dharmaṃ yo taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_273_0: yadā na kurute pāpaṃ sarvabhūteṣu dāruṇam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_273_1: kāyena manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_274_1: tena saṃpadyate brahma tasmān maitrīṃ vibhāvaya //
S01klpdrapu:kda_275_0: yasya lokeṣu kāruṇyaṃ svātmaje iva duḥkhite /
S01klpdrapu:kda_275_1: tena saṃpadyate brahma tasmāt kāruṇiko bhava //
S01klpdrapu:kda_276_0: yac cittaṃ muditaṃ loke sukhībhūte ivātmaje /
S01klpdrapu:kda_276_1: tasya saṃjāyate brahma tal loke modavāṃś cara //
S01klpdrapu:kda_277_1: tasya saṃjāyate brahma tad upekṣāyutaś cara //
S01klpdrapu:kda_278_0: etad dhi paramaṃ brahma- vihāraṃ brahmasādhanam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_280_0: tathā brahmaguṇādhānād brahmarṣis tvaṃ bhaveḥ kila /
S01klpdrapu:kda_281_0: iti śrutvā guror vākya sa subhūtir guṇotsukaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_284_0: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe yā vasantī vanadevatā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_288_1: kṣipraṃ kleśān vinirjitya bodhicittaṃ ca lapsyati //
S01klpdrapu:kda_289_0: bodhicitte pralabdhe tu tadā lokahite caret* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_290_1: taṃ subhūtiṃ samāgamya jagādaivaṃ puraḥ sthitā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_291_0: śṛṇu vatsa mahābhāga yan mayā hitam ucyate /
S01klpdrapu:kda_292_0: kimarthaṃ vasase caivam ekākī nirjane vane /
S01klpdrapu:kda_294_0: buddho hi bhagavān nāthaḥ sarvajño lokanāyakaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_295_1: ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ khyātāḥ paratreha śivaṃkarāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_296_0: dhanyās te bhikṣavaś caiva buddhasyopāsakāś ca ye /
S01klpdrapu:kda_297_0: tvaṃ cāpi hi tathā matvā svaparātmahitārthataḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_299_1: tathānumoditaḥ prāha tāṃ devatāṃ puraḥ sthitām* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_301_0: yadi te 'sti kṛpā devi mayi mokṣārthasādhini /
S01klpdrapu:kda_302_1: tathāśu kṛpayā nītvā māṃ vihāre praveśaya //
S01klpdrapu:kda_303_0: iti śrutvā vacas tasya subhūter vanadevatā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_308_0: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasā cātha subhūtes tasya sarvathā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_308_1: ādhāto yaś ca satveṣu sa prativigato 'py abhūt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_309_1: natvā pādau muner dharmaṃ śrotuṃ tasthau mudāḥ puraḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_312_0: bhāvanīyā sadā maitrī satveṣ evaṃ yathātmaje /
S01klpdrapu:kda_312_1: dharmamātā yato maitrī tan na tyājyā kadācana //
S01klpdrapu:kda_313_0: karuṇā ca tathā kāryā satveṣ api yathātmaje /
S01klpdrapu:kda_313_1: kāruṇyād vardhate dharmas ta kāruṇyaṃ sadā kuru //
S01klpdrapu:kda_314_0: muditāpi sadā sādhyā satveṣu ca yathātmaje /
S01klpdrapu:kda_315_0: upekṣāpi sadā dhāryā satveṣv api yathātmaje /
S01klpdrapu:kda_315_1: upekṣāto labhet saukhyaṃ tadupekṣāṃ sadā bhaja //
S01klpdrapu:kda_319_0: srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā śiṣyo 'bhavan muneḥ (Speyer: śikṣo) /
S01klpdrapu:kda_321_0: adyāgreṇa jagadbandho yāmi te śaraṇaṃ sadā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_322_0: pravrajyāṃ dehi me nātha saddharmeṣu niveśaya /
S01klpdrapu:kda_323_0: ity ukte bhagavān dṛṣṭvā hastena tacchiraḥ spṛśan* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_323_1: ehi bhikṣo carasveti pravadaṃs taṃ samagrahīt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_324_0: ehīti proktaḥ sa jinena muṇḍo pātrī susaṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_324_1: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau bhikṣuḥ subhūtiḥ sugataprabhāvāt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_325_0: saccittalabdhaḥ sa muneḥ prasādāt prayujyamāno vyaharat samādhau /
S01klpdrapu:kda_325_1: vyāyacchamānaḥ khalu bodhimārge saṃbuddhadharme ghaṭamāna eva //
S01klpdrapu:kda_326_0: sarvaṃ ca saṃsāram anityatāhataṃ matvā ca saṃsāragatiṃ vibhaṅginīm* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_326_1: kleśāṃś ca sarvān pravihāya saṃyataḥ sākṣāc ca so 'rhann abhavan maharddhikaḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_327_1: bhindann avidyādrim ivāṇḍakośaṃ prāpadabhijñāḥ pratisaṃvidaś ca //
S01klpdrapu:kda_328_1: pūjyaś ca mānyo abhivādanīyo babhūva sa brahmavihāracārī //
S01klpdrapu:kda_329_1: kutaś cyuto 'ham āyātaḥ kutra kena ca karmaṇā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_330_0: apaśyat sa tataś ceti pañcajanmaśatāni ca /
S01klpdrapu:kda_332_0: idānīṃ tu tathā caitaṃ krodhaṃ prahātum ācare /
S01klpdrapu:kda_332_1: yasyaiva hetunā lokā bhramanti narakeṣu te //
S01klpdrapu:kda_333_1: saṅgād dhi jāyate māyā māyāyāṃ jāyate ratiḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_335_1: krodhānalasamuddīpto dahate sa parān api (Speyer: svaparān api) //
S01klpdrapu:kda_336_1: tāvat kiṃ tapasāpy etan nirarthaṃ duḥkhahetave //
S01klpdrapu:kda_337_1: kṛtaṃ kalpasahasrair yad dahet krodhānalaḥ kṣaṇāt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_339_0: yadā ca garuḍenāhaṃ balād ākṛṣya bhakṣitaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_339_1: yatīn dṛṣṭvānumodaṃ ca kurvan mṛtyum avāptavān* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_341_0: adyāpi cet tathā cātra vaseyaṃ janapadāśrame(?) /
S01klpdrapu:kda_341_1: kenacit kleśitaś cāhaṃ bhraṣṭim evam avāpnuyām* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_344_0: atha saṅge 'pi grāmeṣu deśe janapadeṣu ca /
S01klpdrapu:kda_344_1: bhikṣāhetor vihartuṃ vā sa sakāmo 'bhavad yadā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_345_0: tadā pūrvam asau dṛṣṭvā gocaram abhyalakṣayat* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_345_1: aho deśeṣu sarvatra bhavanti nirguṇā janāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_346_1: tat kathaṃ saṃcariṣye 'tra bhikṣāhetoḥ kule kule //
S01klpdrapu:kda_347_0: dūṣayiṣyanti cittāni kecid dṛṣṭvaiva māṃ yatim* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_347_1: yad dhetor janāś caivaṃ(?) bhramanti durgatiṣv api //
S01klpdrapu:kda_349_2: tam eva dharmam ādhyāya yatir mokṣam avāpnuyāt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_350_0: iti saṃnahya cittena sa subhūtiḥ subuddhimān* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_352_1: kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyaṃ kāṣṭhapāṣāṇavat sthitaḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_353_1: sukhaṃ labdhvāpi kiṃ sāraṃ satvānugrahaṇaṃ vinā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_355_0: iti niścitya cittena sa subhūtiḥ samṛddhimān* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_357_0: etāṃś ca garudān dṛṣṭvā nāgāḥ saṃtrasitās tataḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_357_1: itas tataḥ samudbhrāntāḥ subhūteḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_358_1: sarve nāgāḥ suparṇebhyaḥ paritrātāś ca sarvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_360_0: tenāpy evaṃ suparṇānāṃ pañca kulaśatāni ca /
S01klpdrapu:kda_361_1: itas tataḥ samudbhrāntāḥ subhūteḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_362_0: subhūtinā tathā caivaṃ sarve te garuḍā api /
S01klpdrapu:kda_363_1: dṛṣṭvā sarve janaughās te saharṣādbhutam āyayuḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_364_1: yenaite rakṣitāḥ sarve nāgāś ca garuḍā api //
S01klpdrapu:kda_365_0: iti so 'rhan subhūtis tān sarvān dṛṣṭvā prasannitān* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_366_0: śṛṇudhvaṃ madvacaḥ sarve nāgāś ca garuḍās tathā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_366_1: yadi me śaraṇaṃ yātha ramadhvaṃ maitramānasāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_367_0: ye ete sukhino loke sarve te maitracāriṇaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_367_1: ye ete duḥkhino loke sarve te krodhino narāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_368_1: yāvac citte sthitaṃ krodhaṃ tāvan maitrī na bhāvyate //
S01klpdrapu:kda_369_0: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca maitrīsamaṃ tapaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_370_0: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukham aśnute /
S01klpdrapu:kda_370_1: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite //
S01klpdrapu:kda_371_0: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvam api ghnataḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_371_1: krodham ekaṃ tu yo hanyāt tena sarve dviṣo hatāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_372_1: dahaty ātmānam evādau parān dhakṣyati vā na vā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_373_0: jarā rūpavatāṃ krodhas tamaś cakṣuṣmatām api /
S01klpdrapu:kda_374_1: supto 'pi na labhen nidrāṃ krodhaparyākulo naraḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_376_1: dadāha brahmajaṃ kāmaṃ tac ca krodhaprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_377_0: yad rājāno viruddhāś ca yuddhaṃ kṛtvā parasparam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_377_1: mṛtyuṃ yānti janaiḥ sārdhaṃ tac cāpi krodhabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_379_1: tān api saṃmukhaṃ ghnanti durvāgbāṇai ruṣā khalāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_380_0: mātaraṃ janmadātrīṃ ca dhātrīr vā snehapālinīḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_380_1: svātmajān nirdayā ghnanti tac ca krodhaprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_382_1: anādṛtya bhayaṃ pāpā ghnanti krodhoddhatā narāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_383_0: yat pitā svātmajaṃ putraṃ putrīṃ vā bālakām api /
S01klpdrapu:kda_383_1: nirdayas tāḍayan hanti tasmāt krodho mahāripuḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_385_1: tāḍitā tyajyate bhartrā krodhāt tato mahad bhayaṃ* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_387_1: tān api saṃmukhaṃ duṣṭās tāḍayanti ruṣānvitāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_388_1: so 'pi śakalito rājñā svayam evāsinā ruṣā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_389_0: dānavā ghnanti devāṃś ca devāś ca ghnanti dānavān* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_390_1: vasanti narake ghore te 'pi sarve ruṣānvitāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_391_1: patanti narake ghore te 'pi sarve ruṣāśrayāt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_392_1: krodhena hiṃsyate jantus tasmāt krodho mahāripuḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_393_0: krodhenaiva mahārudraś cic cheda brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_394_2: tatpāpakarmaṇā hy eva śivo 'py abhūd digambaraḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_395_0: krodhena dhvaṃsyate dharmaḥ krodhena vilayaṃ gataḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_395_1: krodhena tyajyate satyaṃ tasmāt krodho mahāripuḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_397_0: tatkrodhād aparo vairaḥ pātako 'nyo na vidyate /
S01klpdrapu:kda_398_0: yena krodho jito vairo jñānavajreṇa sādhunā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_398_1: tena sarve jitā duṣṭā śatravo duḥkhadāyakāḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_399_1: sa sādhupuruṣaś cāpi naiva viśvasyate janaiḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_400_1: sa vidvān api nāsevyo yathā vṛkṣo 'hiveṣṭitaḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_401_1: krodhavān na vibhāty eva ahipūrṇo yathā hradaḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_403_0: krodhavān hasyate lokaiḥ krodhavān vadhyate janaiḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_406_0: adhairyatvād bhaven mūḍho mūḍho duṣṭavaśaṃ vrajet* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_409_0: tataś ca narakān yāyād rauravādīn samantataḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_410_0: itthaṃ duḥkhānuvedī sa narakeṣu sadā vaset* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_410_1: narakebhyas tam uddhartuṃ jino 'pi naiva śaknuyāt* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_412_0: sarveṣāṃ pātakānāṃ tat krodhaṃ mūlaṃ jagur jināḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_412_1: dharmāṇāṃ tu kṣamā mūlaṃ yataḥ saukhyaṃ pravartate //
S01klpdrapu:kda_413_0: iti krodhaṃ vinirjitya kṣamaiva sādhyatāṃ sadā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_414_0: ātmanīva dayā syāc cet svajane vā yathā jane /
S01klpdrapu:kda_416_0: dharmārthī na tyajed asmād dayām iṣṭaphalodayām* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_416_1: suvṛṣṭir iva śasyāni guṇān sā hi prasūyate //
S01klpdrapu:kda_417_0: dayākrāntaṃ cittaṃ na bhavati paradroharabhasaṃ śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_417_1: vivṛddhā tasyaivaṃ parahitarucir maitryanugatā pradānakṣāntyādīñ janayati guṇān kīrtyanusṛtān* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_418_0: dayālur nodvegaṃ janayati pareṣām upaśamād dayālur viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva /
S01klpdrapu:kda_418_1: na saṃrambhakṣobhaḥ prabhavati dayādhīr ahṛdaye na kopāgniś citte jvalayati hi dayātoyaśiśire //
S01klpdrapu:kda_419_0: saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ budhāḥ ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_419_1: tasmāt putra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane sanmaitryā viharanta eva muditāṃ prodbhāvayadhvaṃ sadā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_420_1: tasmād dayāṃ hṛdi sthāpya maitrī loke prasāryatām* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_421_0: maitrīmān puruṣaḥ sādhur devair api praśasyate /
S01klpdrapu:kda_421_1: viśvasyate sadā sadbhir bāndhavaiḥ svajanair janaiḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_422_1: maitrīmān sanmatir bandhur lokānāṃ jagatām api //
S01klpdrapu:kda_423_0: maitrīmāñ jagatām iṣṭo maitrīmāñ jagatāṃ suhṛt* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_423_1: maitrīmāñ jagatāṃ mitro maitrīmāñ jagatāṃ sakhā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_424_0: maitrīmān puruṣaḥ śrīmān yatra yatra pragacchati /
S01klpdrapu:kda_424_1: tatra tatraiva sarvatra pūjyate svajanair yathā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_425_1: so 'pi śāstā vibhāty evaṃ maitryā saṃskārayañ jagat* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_426_1: pūjyante satvalokaiś ca te 'pi maitryāḥ prabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_428_0: yan mātā duḥkhitāpy evam ā garbhād bālakaṃ sutam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_429_0: yat pitā bālakaṃ putram abhuñjānaḥ svayaṃ sukham* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_430_0: yac ca rājā prajāḥ pāti svayaṃ vīravrataṃ dadhat* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_430_1: durjanān mardayan sarvān tac ca maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_431_0: yac ca vidvān guruḥ śiṣyān saddharmārthopadarśayan* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_431_1: prabodhya bālakāñ chāsti tac ca maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_432_0: yac ca vīrā raṇe sthitvā sahantyarīn prahāriṇaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_432_1: prarakṣanti svapakṣāṃś ca tac ca maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_433_1: satvān pāti dadad dānaṃ tac ca maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_434_0: yac ca bhāryānuyāty eva mṛtena svāminā saha /
S01klpdrapu:kda_435_1: anuśocan muhuś cāpi tac ca maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_436_1: svasutān snehataḥ pānti tac ca maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_437_1: svabandhūn snehataḥ pānti tad dhi maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_438_1: bāndhavāṃs te 'pi rakṣanti tad dhi maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_439_1: arthibhyaḥ prārthitaṃ vastu tad dhi maitrīprabhāvataḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_440_0: evam anye 'pi ye lokā bhojayantaḥ parasparam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_441_0: maitrī hi jagatāṃ mātā pitā śāstā guruḥ prabhuḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_441_1: patir mitraḥ suhṛd bandhus tasmān maitrī prasādhyatām+ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_442_0: maitrīṃ vinā na jāyeta karuṇā svātmaje 'pi ca /
S01klpdrapu:kda_442_1: na muditā na copekṣā tasmān maitrī pradhīyatām* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_444_0: etā vinā na śobhanti mahābhijñās tapasvinaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_447_1: maitrīṃ citte samādhāya kurudhvaṃ prāṇiṣu kṣamām* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_449_0: iti śrutvā vacas tasya nāgāś ca garuḍā yateḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_450_0: iti dṛṣṭvā ca te satvā vismayaharṣasaṃyutāḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_451_0: evaṃ subhūtinā tena nāgāś ca garuḍāś ca te /
S01klpdrapu:kda_454_0: eṣa me śrāvakāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ brahmacāriṇām* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_455_0: iti tena munīndreṇa subhūtir eva sadyatiḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_456_1: cchetāraṃ saṃśayānāṃ taṃ papracchur evam īśvaram* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_457_0: kāni bhadanta karmāṇi kṛtāny api subhūtinā /
S01klpdrapu:kda_458_0: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭo bhagavān ity udāharat* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_458_1: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarve tat kṛtaṃ yat subhūtinā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_459_0: subhūtinā kṛtaṃ karma tat ko 'nyaḥ paribhokṣyate /
S01klpdrapu:kda_459_1: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva tat prabhujyate //
S01klpdrapu:kda_460_0: bhūtapūrvam atīte 'dhvany asmin* kalpe ca bhadrake /
S01klpdrapu:kda_461_0: tasmiṃś ca samaye buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma nāyakaḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_464_1: ayaṃ pravrajito bhūtvā mahādātāpy abhūt tadā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_467_0: māṇava uttaro nāma vyākṛta iti bodhaye /
S01klpdrapu:kda_467_1: māṇava tvaṃ prajānāṃ tu yadā varṣaśatāyuṣi //
S01klpdrapu:kda_470_0: tenaiva karmaṇā cādya praviṣṭo mama śāsane /
S01klpdrapu:kda_471_0: kāni punar anenaiva karmāṇi prakṛtāny api /
S01klpdrapu:kda_471_1: yenaiva nāgayonau ca samutpanno babhūva saḥ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_472_0: yat taḥ kleśāprahīṇatvād udbhrāntendriyacetasā (Speyer: yataḥ kleśāŚ) /
S01klpdrapu:kda_475_1: yac cānena punas tatra pravrajya buddhaśāsane //
S01klpdrapu:kda_476_0: sadā dānāni saṃdatvā brahmacaryaṃ ca pālitam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_477_1: iti hi bhikṣavo yūyaṃ jānīdhvaṃ karmatāphalam* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_478_0: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tasyaiva tat phalaṃ dhruvam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_478_1: na naśyanti hi karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
S01klpdrapu:kda_478_2: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehināṃ //
S01klpdrapu:kda_479_0: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kathaṃcana /
S01klpdrapu:kda_479_1: nāgnibhir dahyate karma vāyubhir nāpi śuṣyati /
S01klpdrapu:kda_479_2: udakaiḥ klidyate naiva bhūmiṣv api na naśyati //
S01klpdrapu:kda_480_0: anyathāpi ca no bhūtā sarvathā karmaṇāṃ gatiḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_480_1: śuklānāṃ śuklatā nityaṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ kṛṣṇatā khalu /
S01klpdrapu:kda_480_2: miśrataiva tu miśrāṇāṃ ṣaḍgatau bhujyate dhruvam* //
S01klpdrapu:kda_481_0: tasmād apāsya kṛṣṇāni karmāṇi miśritāni ca /
S01klpdrapu:kda_482_0: tatheti bhikṣavaḥ śrutvā te ca lokāḥ prabhāṣitāḥ /
S01klpdrapu:kda_483_0: evam etan mahārāja śrutaṃ me gurubhāṣitam* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_484_1: maitrīṃ bhāvaya satveṣu svātmajeṣu yathā sadā //
S01klpdrapu:kda_486_0: ye maitrībhāvadharmaṃ kalimatiharaṇaṃ tat subhūteś caritraṃ śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti tribhuvanasukhadaṃ saṃnipātya janaughān* /
S01klpdrapu:kda_486_1: te lokā maitracittās tribhuvanasukhadāḥ kṣāntisaurabhyayuktāḥ yātāḥ saukhāvatīṃ te 'py amitarucimuner dharmam ārādhayanti /
